title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash! This stunning desk is the perfect addition to any home or professional office. 

With its generous 59-inch width, you'll have plenty of space to spread out and work comfortably. The desk is made from durable medium-density fiberboard, ensuring it will withstand daily use. The beautiful blonde ash finish and paper laminate add a touch of elegance to any space.

Stay organized with the Realspace® Magellan desk's ample storage options. It features a slide-out keyboard tray, perfect for maximizing your workspace. Plus, with four drawers, including a convenient file drawer and three box drawers, you'll have plenty of room to store all your essentials.

We understand that durability is important, which is why this desk is scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant. You can work with confidence, knowing that your desk will stay looking great for years to come.

Assembly is required for this desk, but don't worry, we've got you covered. The desk is designed to meet ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring its quality and reliability. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may require more than one person to handle during assembly.

For added convenience, we offer in-home assembly service. If you prefer, our team can assemble the desk for you. Simply contact our dedicated assembly service hotline at 866-388-4350.

Upgrade your office space with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. Order yours today and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability!

This spacious desk is perfect for both home and professional use, offering a generous 59-inch width to accommodate all your work essentials. Crafted with durable medium-density fiberboard and finished with a sleek paper laminate, this desk is not only stylish but built to last.

With four drawers in total, including a convenient slide-out keyboard tray and a file drawer, you'll have ample storage space to keep your workspace organized and clutter-free. The three box drawers are perfect for storing stationery, documents, and other essentials.

The Blonde Ash finish adds a touch of elegance to any room, while the scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant properties ensure long-lasting beauty. 

Assembly is required, but don't worry, we provide detailed instructions to make the process as smooth as possible. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may be helpful to have more than one person handle the desk during assembly.

Rest assured, this desk meets the ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring the highest level of quality and durability. 

To make your life even easier, we offer an in-home assembly service. Simply contact our dedicated team at 866-388-4350, and they'll take care of everything for you.
